practice_phrases: I soon will stop.
我很快就要停止。
I soon will come back.
我很快就要回来。
I soon will stop talking.
我很快就要停止说话。
I soon will learn his name.
我很快就要学会他的名字。
I soon will find out the answer.
我很快就要找出答案。
I soon will want to meet people who speak Chinese.
我很快就要想认识会说中文的人。
I soon will speak Chinese with you.
我很快就要和你说中文。
I soon will come back with everyone else later.
我很快就要晚点和其他人一起回来。
I soon will meet at six o'clock this evening.
我很快就要今天晚上六点见面。

seed_context.known: 我很快就要开始多说话了。
seed_context.target: I'm going to start talking more soon.

I soon will start speaking Chinese with you.
